channel.title: Help lmaooo?
channel.description:
Ok what i did is i made all my client maps and files invisible, and what i thought was that only I could see them, but i was wrong they vanished lol and now idk how to get them back?
By invisible i mean like the other servers, when you dl their client, you can't see the files they have (you know to avoid leeching) all you see is the run.bat, like mine..but what i want to do now is WHAT CAN I DO TO BRING EM' BACK?? :P

item.title: Help lmaooo?
item.dc:creator: @Darthax Darthax
item.description:
@Darthax wrote:

just go to tool’d scrol down to folder opshions then go to view tab in there will be a list off crap look in that list for show hidden folders click it then click applye

Read full topic
